original_text: But they presumed to go up to the heights of the hill country, although neither the ark of the covenant of the Lord nor Moses departed out of the camp.
korean_text: 그들이 그래도 산 꼭대기로 올라갔고 여호와의 언약궤와 모세는 진영을 떠나지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: But they presumed to go up
to the heights of the hill country
although neither the ark of the covenant of the Lord
nor Moses departed out of the camp
